definition: about to be mentioned or specified, the act of pursuing in an effort to overtake or capture
details:
adjective
- about to be mentioned or specified
= synonyms: undermentioned
- in the desired direction
- immediately following in time or order
= example: immediately following in time or order
= synonyms: next
- going or proceeding or coming after in the same direction
= example: going or proceeding or coming after in the same direction
noun
- the act of pursuing in an effort to overtake or capture
= synonyms: pursuit
- a group of followers or enthusiasts
= synonyms: followers
